li.label: Anime Hair Color Variety
li.tooltip: Adjusts the commonality of hair color genes so colors like teal are more common. With this mod's hair colors active, more vibrant hair colors will be in the rotation. Realistic hair colors are still favored but to a much lower degree than vanilla.

li.label: Anime Eye Color Variety
li.tooltip: Changes the eye color pool from EyeGenes2 using SpawnThoseGenes in a similar fashion to Anime Hair Color Variety. Requires both to be installed.

li.label: Better SpawnThoseGenes Integration For Vanilla Xenotypes
li.tooltip: Pawns will spawn with only one hair/skintone from their xenotype's genepool just like baseliners.

li.label: Remove Extra Hair Colors
li.tooltip: Removes all hair colors added by this mod.

li.label: Highmates Are Capable of Violence
li.tooltip: Removes the violence disabled gene and replaced it with dead calm, terrible melee, terrible shooting, and weak melee.

li.label: Lovely Feline Highmates
li.tooltip: Adds the lovely cat ears and tail genes from AFU Cosmetic Gene Expanded to highmates.

li.label: Standard Body Highmates
li.tooltip: Removes the thin body gene from highmates so they only generate with standard bodies.

li.label: Butchering Piggers Yields Pork
li.tooltip: Requires EBSG Framework. This option is only available with EBSG Framework installed.

li.label: Standard Body Piggers
li.tooltip: Removes the forced fat and hulk bodies from Pigskins and replaces them with standard bodies.

li.label: Remove Dirtmole From New Pawn Generation
li.tooltip: Prevents dirtmole pawns from being created by the game. Doesn't remove them completely, so they can still be selected as starting pawns or edited in the xenotype editor.
